events.message: The applicant has formally submitted the mortgage loan application for the purchase of a new property.
The loan application was reviewed and categorised as a mortgage loan for a residential house purchase.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to manage the mortgage application and assist the applicant.
The loan officer completed an initial review of the mortgage application and supporting details provided by the applicant.
Additional documents were requested from the applicant, including property appraisal and proof of income documents.
The applicant submitted all requested documents, fulfilling the requirements needed to proceed with the mortgage evaluation.
Credit check on the applicant was performed and the credit history shows a stable financial background.
Risk assessment was conducted and the mortgage loan shows acceptable risk levels based on current financial status.
A mortgage loan offer was presented to the applicant outlining the terms, interest rate, and repayment schedule.
The applicant provided positive feedback and asked a few clarifying questions regarding the mortgage loan offer.
The application was escalated to the senior underwriting team for final approval due to high loan amount.
The mortgage loan application was approved following thorough underwriting and risk assessment.
The approved mortgage funds were disbursed to the sellerâ€™s account to complete the property purchase.
Follow-up was conducted with the applicant to ensure all loan servicing details and first payment dates are clear.
The mortgage loan application process was successfully completed and the case has now been closed.
